title: The White Lady
description: Avery Dunham has always been ready to follow her friend, time-traveling wizard, Ignus Burke, on incredible adventures. This time, though, she has serious misgivings. Itâ€™s just one week before Christmas, but she cannot get him to change his mind .The usually cool and collected magic-wielding leader is wholly obsessed by the portrait of the White Lady whom he is bent on rescuing.Almost as soon as they begin their journey, it becomes clear their mission is a trap.Avery was this adventure is not going to be like any other.
author: Beth Trissel
